name: 3% commission on Tablets and Notebooks priced 300€ and higher
description: This commission entails a 5% charge on all tablets and notebooks listed on the marketplace that have a retail price of 300€ or higher. The commission is calculated based on the total price of the eligible devices and is deducted from the merchant's earnings.

name: 6% commission on Sony Cameras products
description: This commission applies a 6% charge on all sales of Sony Camera products listed on the marketplace. The commission is calculated based on the total sale price of each Sony Camera product and is deducted from the merchant's earnings.

name: Default 5% commission for VIP merchants
description: This commission involves a standard 5% charge applied to all sales made by VIP merchants on the marketplace. The commission is calculated based on the total sale price of each transaction and is deducted from the merchant's earnings.

name: Default 7% commission for all merchants
description: This commission entails a standard 7% charge applied to all sales made by merchants on the marketplace. The commission is calculated based on the total sale price of each transaction and is deducted from the merchant's earnings.

name: Fixed 50 cents commission on all items
description: This commission entails a fixed charge of 50 cents on all items sold through the marketplace. The commission is deducted from the merchant's earnings for each item sold
